page.title: 03Morton Youth Club
page.content:
I go to the village hall at 7.30 p.m. on a Wednesday to a Youth Club.I stay until 9.00 p.m.At the Youth Club they have pool tables and a set of darts. They also have a table tennis table. They have a record-player and a member called Michelle Essom takes records.To get in you have to pay 15p.When you are at the Youth Club you have to be 11 years old and over.It is run by a man called Mick and a lady called Josie.
Domesday Group Morton C.P.School 1985
Mr.R.Greig,Mrs.P.M.Greatorex,Hayley Baxter,Matthew Smith,Adrian Cowan,Ruth Lane,Wayne Colley,Claire Young,Clare Slack,Philip Lord,Stephen Grocock,Neil Currie,Sonya Laming,Alison Emery.
